Build and release your inner strength based on the amount of focus. When spirit reaches <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font>, the damage for all attacks increases by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> and movement speed increases by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font>. When spirit is under <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> but above <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font>, the abilities above increase by <font color='#00aaef'>1.8%</font> and <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> respectively. When spirit is below <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font> but above <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font>, the abilities above increase by <font color='#00aaef'>0.6%</font> and <font color='#00aaef'>2%</font> respectively. When spirit is below <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font>, Pace Control is disabled.

When spirit is under <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> but above <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font>, the abilities above increase by <font color='#00aaef'>7.8%</font> and <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> respectively. When spirit is below <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font> but above <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font>, the abilities above increase by <font color='#00aaef'>2.6%</font> and <font color='#00aaef'>2%</font> respectively. When spirit is below <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font>, Pace Control is disabled.

When spirit is below <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font>, Pace Control is disabled.

Gather energy from your surroundings to create an energy orb and launch it at the nearest enemy <font color='#00aaef'>7.5</font> m in front, dealing <font color='#00aaef'>38%</font> damage. Release a mysterious aura from the body, flying forward <font color='#00aaef'>4.5</font> m and leaving an afterimage in your wake. Increases evasion by <font color='#00aaef'>50</font> while moving. The skill can be both canceled and triggered immediately while using other skills. You are immune to knockback while this skill is active. Consumes <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> stamina.

Focus on the mysterious energy within to create Mantra Cores (orb energy) and restore 12 spirit. You can create up to 4 Mantra Cores, which can be activated consecutively as long as the key is held. While the Mantra Cores are being created, a greater amount of energy can be controlled and a some skills can be enhanced prior to activation.
